module.name: GraphType
module.short: Definitions of several special types (including Raw Image) to be used for graphics.

descr.p: graphtype.pp contains graphic-related platform-independent types and utility functions.
This file is part of the LazUtils package.

element.name: TGraphicsFillStyle.fsSurface
element.short: Fill till the color (it fills all except this color).

element.name: TGraphicsFillStyle.fsBorder
element.short: Fill this color (it fills only connected pixels of this color).

element.name: TGraphicsDrawEffect.gdeNormal
element.short: No drawing effect.

element.name: TGraphicsDrawEffect.gdeDisabled
element.short: Drawn with a grayed image.

element.name: TGraphicsDrawEffect.gdeHighlighted
element.short: Drawn with a highlighted image.

element.name: TGraphicsDrawEffect.gdeShadowed
element.short: Drawn with a shadowed image.

element.name: TGraphicsDrawEffect.gde1Bit
element.short: 1-Bit image (for non-XP windows buttons).

element.name: TRawImageColorFormat
element.short: Color format for raw image data.

descr.p: Color format for raw image data. A raw image can contain RGBA or monochrome pixels.
Higher values means higher intensity. For example: Red=0 means no Red, Alpha=0 means transparent.

element.name: TRawImageColorFormat.ricfNone
element.short: ricfNone indicates an uninitialized image.

element.name: TRawImageColorFormat.ricfRGBA
element.short: Each pixel contains red, green, blue and alpha values. If AlphaPrec=0 then there is no alpha channel. Same for RedPrec, GreenPrec and BluePrec.

element.name: TRawImageColorFormat.ricfGray
element.short: Red, Green, and Blue have the same values. Red stores the Gray. AlphaPrec can be >0.

element.name: TRawImageByteOrder
element.short: The LSB/MSB-first byte order of pixel data.

element.name: TRawImageByteOrder.riboLSBFirst
element.short: Least Significant Byte first.

element.name: TRawImageByteOrder.riboMSBFirst
element.short: Most SignificantBbyte first.

element.name: TRawImageBitOrder
element.short: Bit order for raw image data scan lines.
element.descr: The first pixel in a raw image line can be the left or right pixel of the displayed image.

element.name: TRawImageBitOrder.riboBitsInOrder
element.short: Bit 0 represents first pixel.

element.name: TRawImageBitOrder.riboReversedBits
element.short: Bit 0 represents highest pixel.

element.name: TRawImageLineEnd
element.short: The alignment of raw image scanlines.

element.name: TRawImageLineEnd.rileTight
element.short: No gap at the end of Scanlines; Scanlines can begin inside a byte boundary.

element.name: TRawImageLineEnd.rileByteBoundary
element.short: Scanlines start on a byte boundary.

element.name: TRawImageLineEnd.rileWordBoundary
element.short: Scanlines start at a 16-bit boundary.

element.name: TRawImageLineEnd.rileDWordBoundary
element.short: Scanlines start at a 32-bit (DWORD) boundary.

element.name: TRawImageLineEnd.rileQWordBoundary
element.short: Scanlines start at a 64-bit (QWORD) boundary.

element.name: TRawImageLineEnd.rileDQWordBoundary
element.short: Scanlines start at a 128-bit boundary.

element.name: TRawImageLineOrder
element.short: The first stored line of pixels can represent the logical top or bottom of the displayed image.

element.name: TRawImageLineOrder.riloTopToBottom
element.short: First scanline at the top.

element.name: TRawImageLineOrder.riloBottomToTop
element.short: First scanline at the bottom.

element.name: TRawImageQueryFlag
element.short: Image formats supported by a device, or present in image data.

element.name: TRawImageQueryFlag.riqfMono
element.short: Include a description for a mono image.

element.name: TRawImageQueryFlag.riqfGrey
element.short: Include a description for a grey image.

element.name: TRawImageQueryFlag.riqfRGB
element.short: Include a description for an RGB image.

element.name: TRawImageQueryFlag.riqfAlpha
element.short: Include a description for an Alpha channel.

element.name: TRawImageQueryFlag.riqfMask
element.short: Include a description for a Mask.

element.name: TRawImageQueryFlag.riqfPalette
element.short: Include a description for a Palette.

element.name: TRawImageQueryFlag.riqfUpdate
element.short: Update given description (instead of clearing it).

element.name: TRawImageDescription
element.short: Descriptor object for the image format of devices and raw (uncompressed) image data.

descr.p: This effectively is a record with some attached methods. More related procedures exist outside the object.
The object describes the presence and exact storage of the RGBA image and mask pixels, of a device or image. The color information is stored in aligned scanlines.
Note: palettes, BitOrder and ByteOrder seem not to be implemented yet. The meaning of the PaletteXXX values and of BitOrder is undefined, so far.
xxxBitsPerPixel and xxxPrecisionMask applies to color data. For masked images, the pixels and the mask are two different arrays, containing different elements.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Format
element.short: An initialized image can contain color (RGBA) or monochrome pixels.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Width
element.short: Width of the image in pixels.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Height
element.short: Height of the image in pixels.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Depth
element.short: Number of bits used per pixel.
element.descr: The color and pixel storage can be subject to alignment, so that the logical color Depth can be less than the physical BitsPerPixel.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.ByteOrder
element.short: The LSB/MSB-first byte order of color data.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.LineOrder
element.short: The first stored line of pixels can represent the logical top or bottom of the displayed image.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.LineEnd
element.short: Alignment of the scanlines.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BitsPerPixel
element.short: Number of bits stored per pixel.
element.descr: BitsPerPixel can be greater than the logical (used) Depth.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.RedPrec
element.short: Bits per pixel in the Red channel.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.RedShift
element.short: Bit offset of the Red channel in color data.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.GreenPrec
element.short: Bits per pixel in the Green channel.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.GreenShift
element.short: Bit offset of the Green channel in color data.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BluePrec
element.short: Bits per pixel in the Blue channel.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BlueShift
element.short: Bit offset of the Blue channel in color data.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.AlphaPrec
element.short: Bits per pixel in the Alpha channel.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.AlphaShift
element.short: Bit offset of the Alpha channel in color data.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskBitsPerPixel
element.short: Bits per mask pixel, usually 1, 0 when no mask.

descr.p: Mask-related properties are only valid if there is a mask (MaskBitsPerPixel > 0).

A pixel Mask currently has a logical depth of 1 bit per pixel, but a pixel can occupy an entire byte. As opposed to the Alpha (transparency) channel, a Mask is stored in its own array. A Mask value of 1 means that the pixel is masked (transparent); a value of 0 means the pixel value is shown (opaque).

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskShift
element.short: The bit offset of the mask bit.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskLineEnd
element.short: Alignment of Mask lines.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskBitOrder
element.short: Bit order of the Mask.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteColorCount
element.short: Entries in the color palette, 0 when no palette.

descr.p: Palette-related properties are only valid if there is a palette (PaletteColorCount > 0).

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteBitsPerIndex
element.short: Bits per palette index, stored in the pixel data.

descr.p: When a palette is used, the color description fields apply to the palette colors, while pixel data contains the palette index. Then Depth applies to the size of the palette colors, and the pixel data is described by PaletteBitsPerIndex and PaletteShift.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteShift
element.short: Bit shift direction from least to most significant.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteBitOrder
element.short: Bit order of the palette indices.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.PaletteByteOrder
element.short: Byte order of the palette indices.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init
element.short: Initialize the image descriptor to all zeroes.

descr.p: A constructor cannot be used here, it would break compatibility with a record.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP1
element.short: 1-bit mono format.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP16_R5G6B5
element.short: 16-bit format.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP24_B8G8R8_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init for an unmasked 24 bit RGB image (LSB Blue).

descr.p: Init_BPP24_B8G8R8_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format
descr.pre: { pf24bit: Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=24 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=24 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP24_B8G8R8_M1_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init for a masked 24 bit RGB image (LSB Blue).

descr.p: Init_BPP24_B8G8R8_M1_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format
descr.pre: { pf24bit: Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=24 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=24 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 Masked }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP32_B8G8R8_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init for an unmasked 32 bit RGB image (LSB blue).

descr.p: Init_BPP32_B8G8R8_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format
descr.pre: { pf32bit: Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=24 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=32 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 No alpha No mask }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP32_B8G8R8_M1_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init for a masked 32 bit RGB image (LSB blue).

descr.p: Init_BPP32_B8G8R8_M1_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format
descr.pre: { pf32bit: Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=24 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=32 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 no alpha with mask }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP32_B8G8R8A8_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init for an unmasked 32 bit RGBA image (LSB blue).

descr.p: Init_BPP32_B8G8R8A8_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format
descr.pre: { pf32bit: Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=32 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=32 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 alpha no mask }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.Init_BPP32_B8G8R8A8_M1_BIO_TTB
element.short: Init for a masked 32 bit RGBA image (LSB blue).

descr.p: Init_BPP32_B8G8R8A8_M1_BIO_TTB - initiator for specified format
descr.pre: { pf32bit: Format=ricfRGBA HasPalette=false Depth=32 PaletteColorCount=0 BitOrder=riboBitsInOrder ByteOrder=DefaultByteOrder LineOrder=riloTopToBottom BitsPerPixel=32 LineEnd=rileDWordBoundary RedPrec=8 RedShift=16 GreenPrec=8 GreenShift=8 BluePrec=8 BlueShift=0 alpha masked }

element.name: TRawImageDescription.GetDescriptionFromMask
element.short: Returns an monochrome image descriptor constructed from the Mask.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.GetDescriptionFromAlpha
element.short: Returns an monochrome image descriptor constructed from the Alpha channel.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.GetRGBIndices
element.short: Gets the indices of channels in four-element array.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BytesPerLine
element.short: The number of bytes per scanline.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.BitsPerLine
element.short: The number of bits per scanline.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskBytesPerLine
element.short: The number of bytes per Mask scanline.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.MaskBitsPerLine
element.short: The number of bits per Mask scanline.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.AsString
element.short: The image descriptor as a string.

element.name: TRawImageDescription.IsEqual
element.short: Compares with the given description, returns True if it is equal.

element.name: PRawImageDescription
element.short: Pointer to

element.name: TRawImagePosition
element.short: Record describing a position in Raw Image data.
element.descr: Byte is the byte offset, Bit the bit number/offset in that byte.

element.name: PRawImagePosition
element.short: PRawImagePosition - pointer to a TRawImagePosition.

element.name: TRawImage
element.short: An uncompressed graphics image (bitmap).

descr.p: This object hold the pixels, mask and color palette of the image, as well as a detailed description of the storage format of these parts.
This object currently is subject to refactoring, don't use it in application code.

element.name: TRawImage.Description
element.short: Description record for the Raw Image.

element.name: TRawImage.Data
element.short: Data - a pointer to the actual data of the image.

element.name: TRawImage.DataSize
element.short: DataSize - pointer to the size of the image.

element.name: TRawImage.Mask
element.short: Mask - pointer to the Mask for use with the image.

element.name: TRawImage.MaskSize
element.short: MaskSize - pointer to the size of the mask.

element.name: TRawImage.Palette
element.short: Palette - pointer to the palette of colors for this image.

element.name: TRawImage.PaletteSize
element.short: PaletteSize - pointer to the size of the palette.

element.name: TRawImage.Init
element.short: Init - initiator for the object. Don't use a constructor here, it will break compatibility with a record.

element.name: TRawImage.CreateData
element.short: CreateData - method to create the data for the record.

element.name: TRawImage.FreeData
element.short: Destroys the allocated Data, Mask and Palette arrays.

element.name: TRawImage.ReleaseData
element.short: ReleaseData - frees the resources when finished with the data.

element.name: TRawImage.ExtractRect
element.short: ExtractRect - find the position of the bounding rectangle from the raw data.

element.name: TRawImage.PerformEffect
element.short: PerformEffect - applies a specified special effect to the data of the Raw Image.

element.name: TRawImage.ReadBits
element.short: ReadBits - reads the bit values for the raw image data at a given position.

element.name: TRawImage.ReadChannels
element.short: Reads the Red, Green, Blue and Alpha channel values at a given position in pixel data.

element.name: TRawImage.ReadMask
element.short: Reads the Mask value at the given position in the image data.
element.descr: Reads the Mask value at the given position in the image data. Returns AMask=True if the pixel is transparent. The position in the Mask data typically differs from the position in the color data.

element.name: TRawImage.WriteBits
element.short: Writes ABits into Data at the given position.

element.name: TRawImage.WriteChannels
element.short: WriteChannels - writes the specified channel values at the nominated position.

element.name: TRawImage.IsMasked
element.short: IsMasked - returns True if the specified pixels are masked.

element.name: TRawImage.IsTransparent
element.short: IsTransparent - returns True if the specified pixels are transparent.

element.name: TRawImage.IsEqual
element.short: IsEqual - returns True if the current and specified images are equal.

element.name: PRawImage
element.short: PRawImage - pointer to a TRawImage.

element.name: TRawImageLineStarts
element.short: TRawImageLineStarts - contains a list of the start positions of the lines in the Raw Image.

element.name: TRawImageLineStarts.Positions
element.short: The array of start positions for scanlines in a raw image.

element.name: TRawImageLineStarts.Init
element.short: Init - initiator for the object. Don't use a constructor here, it will break compatibility with a record.

element.name: TRawImageLineStarts.GetPosition
element.short: GetPosition - returns the position specified by x, y coordinates as a TRawImagePosition.

element.name: PRawImageLineStarts
element.short: PRawImageLineStarts - pointer to TRawImageLineStarts.

element.name: DefaultByteOrder
element.short: Byte order for raw image data on the platform or widgetset.
element.descr: Value from TRawImageByteOrder with the byte order (Endian-ness) for the platform or widgetset

element.name: GetBytesPerLine
element.short: GetBytesPerLine - returns the number of bytes per line (as a pointer).

element.name: GetBitsPerLine
element.short: GetBitsPerLine - returns the number of bits per line (as a pointer).

element.name: CopyImageData
element.short: CopyImageData - copies data from ASource to ADestination, returning True if successful.

element.name: MissingBits
element.descr: Used to pad bit data in a raw image to specific precisions and byte boundaries.
